column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been here many times
column3: I realized my love for Smoque. My dad called and asked if I wanted to come over for dinner. I said maybe
column4: I had some work to catch up
column5: and should probably clean my apartment. He replied
column7: let me know because we're ordering Smoque and need to know how much to order." Smoque
column8: you say? Forget work and cleaning
